titles.title: A resolution to provide for issuance of a summons and for related procedures concerning the articles of impeachment against Samuel B. Kent.
A resolution to provide for issuance of a summons and for related procedures concerning the articles of impeachment against Samuel B. Kent.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Requires a summons to be issued which commands Samuel B. Kent to file with the Secretary of the Senate an answer to the articles of impeachment against him by July 2, 2009, and thereafter to abide by, obey, and perform such orders, directions, and judgments as the Senate shall make in the premises, according to the U.S. Constitution and federal laws.
Prescribes procedures for implementing such articles of impeachment.
